phrases: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony.
Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them.
But when the world needed him most, he vanished.
A hundred years passed, and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar...
And although his airbending skills are great.
He has a lot to learn before he is ready to save anyone.
But I believe Aang can save the world.
The only reason you should be interrupting me is if you have news about the Avatar.
Well, there is news, Prince Zuko, but you might not like it.
Uncle, you taught me that keeping a level head is a sign of a great leader.
Now whatever you have to say, I am sure that I can take it.
Okay, then... we have no idea where he is.
You really should open a window in here.
Ah, There have been multiple sightings of the Avatar,...
How am I going to find him, Uncle?
He is clearly a master of evasive maneuvering.
You have no idea where you are going, do you?
Weeelll, I know it is near water...
I guess we are getting close then.
But I am not doing it now.
You need to give girls space when they do their sewing.
What does me being a girl have to do with sewing?
Simple, girls are better at fixing pants than guys,...
It is just the natural order of things.
And look what a great job I did!
Where we are going, you will not need any pants!
We just made a pit stop yesterday.
Should not we get a little more flying done before we camp out?
At this rate we will not get to the North Pole until spring.
But Appa's tired already, are not you boy?
I said, are not you boy?
Still, hard to argue with a ten ton magical monster.
That is why we are here...
He looks pretty good out there.
The fish is doing all the work.
There is something in the water!
Well, let us not stick around and find out.
Or we could stay a while...
You three have some explaining to do.
And if you do not answer all our questions,...
Where are the men who ambushed us?
Now tell us, who are you and what are you doing here?
Wait a second, there is no way that a bunch of girls took us down.
The unagi's going to eat well tonight.
My brother is just an idiot sometimes.
I am sorry we came here.
I wanted to ride the elephant koi.
How do we know you are not Fire Nation spies?
Kyoshi stayed out of the war so far.
And we intend to keep it that way!
This island is named for Kyoshi?
Avatar Kyoshi was born here four hundred years ago.
She is been dead for centuries.
I know her because I am the Avatar.
The last Avatar was an airbender who disappeared a hundred years ago.
Throw the imposter to the unagi!
It is true... you are the Avatar!
He is not getting away from me this time.
Are you going to finish that?
I was going to save it for later!
These people sure know how to treat an Avatar!
Katara you have got to try these!
He is just upset because a bunch of girls kicked his butt yesterday.
And then they kicked your butt.
I will show them a thing or two.
I am not scared of any girls.
Who do they think they are anyway?
What is he so angry about?
They are giving us the royal treatment.
Hey, do not get too comfortable.
It is risky for us to stay in one place for very long.
I am sure we will be fine.
Besides, did you see how happy I am making this town?
They are even cleaning up that statue in my honor!
Well, it is nice to see you excited about being the Avatar.
I just hope it does not all go to your head.
Come on, you know me better than that.
I am just a simple monk.
Painting the Avatar... that is easy enough...
I will make an adjustment here, and...
Did not mean to interrupt your dance lesson.
I was just looking for somewhere to get a little workout?
Well, you are in the right place.
I did not know that you were friends with the Avatar.
I mean, normally I would hold a grudge,...
A big strong man like you?
We would not stand a chance.
After all, I am the best warrior in my village.
Maybe you would be kind enough to give us a little demonstration.
Would not you like him to show us some moves?
Well, if that is what you want, I would be happy to.
All right, you stand over there.
This may be a little tough, but try to block me.
Of course, I was going easy on you.
Let us see if you can handle this!
Anything else you want to teach us?
Excuse me for a second, ladies.
Can you help me carry this back to the room?
What do you mean you cannot?
I promised the girls that I would give them a ride on Appa.
Why do not you come with us?
Watching you show off for a bunch of girls does not sound like fun.
Well, neither does carrying your basket.
These supplies are for our trip.
I told you, we have to leave Kyoshi soon.
I do not want to leave Kyoshi yet.
I cannot put my finger on it, but there is something I really like about this place.
What is taking you so long, Aangy?
I thought you promised me that this Avatar stuff would not go to your head.
You just do not want to come because you are jealous.
Jealous that we are having so much fun without you.
It is a little ridiculous, but I understand.
No... I... well, let me explain.
I would be honored if you would teach me.
Even if I am a girl?
I am sorry if I insulted you earlier.
We normally do not teach outsiders, let alone boys.
I will not let you down.
But you have to follow all of our traditions.
And I mean all of them.
Do I really have to wear this?
The silk threads symbolizes the brave blood that flows through our veins.
The gold insignia represents the honor of the warrior's heart.
Katara, remember how the unagi almost got me yesterday?
Well, I am going to go ride it now.
It is going to be real dangerous.
You are not going to stop me?
I am glad you are glad.
You are not going to master it in one day.
Even I am not that good.
I think I am starting to get it.
Our technique is about using your opponents' force against them.
Think of the fan as an extension of your arm.
Wait for an opening and then...
I fell on purpose to make you feel better!
Okay, it was a lucky shot.
Let us see if you can do it again.
I am sure it will be here any second!
I wanted to make sure you were safe.
Back there you acted like you did not care.
I did let all that attention go to my head.
Well, get out of the water before you catch a cold, you big jerk!
Firebenders have landed on our shores!
Hey, I am not a... oh, whatever!
You cannot hide from me forever!
But these little girls cannot save you.
Look what I brought to this place.
These people got their town destroyed trying to protect me.
Then let us get out of here.
Zuko will leave Kyoshi to follow us.
I know it feels wrong to run, but I think it is the only way.
There is no time to say goodbye.
I treated you like a girl when I should have treated you like a warrior.
But I am a girl, too.
Do not lose sight of them!
I know it is hard, but you did the right thing.
Zuko would have destroyed the whole place if we had stayed.
They are going to be okay, Aang.
